head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths VON STADE, SANDRA C.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths VON STADE, SANDRA C.

block.p: VON STADE-Sandra C., 61, of Peapack, NJ, on Monday, February 7th, 2000 after a long illness. Wife of John T. von Stade of Peapack, mother of John, Jr. of Darien, CT, sister of David H. Carnahan of NYC. Also survived by a granddaughter Lily of Darien, CT. Funeral services will be Thursday, February 10th, at 11 AM, at St. Luke's Episcopal Church, Gladstone. Contributions in lieu of flowers may be made to the Matheny School and Hospital, Peapack, NJ 07977 or the ASPCA, 424 E. 92nd Street, New York, NY 10128.
